column4: Good food for a low price. Nice service and pleasant atmosphere. Totally worth it - go and check it out!
Fabulous homemade food. Friendly staff. Nothing is too much trouble. Pizza, pasta and wine delicious.

column3: Good place close to the Eiffel Tower
column4: The staff was very welcoming and the pizza was good as well. The Vegetarienne pizza had surprisingly few vegetables though .. Great if you want to eat something relatively cheap close to the Eiffel Tower!
Very good food..average prizes and really nice Staff.. i had the "penne au poulet" which comes with a really tasty..rich and creamy Sauce..would defenately come back..bella italia
We decided to go here because it seemed like the best restaurant which served pasta in the area. Very good food, nice prices and staff that made you feel welcome.
Good food for a low price. Nice service and pleasant atmosphere. Totally worth it - go and check it out!
Fabulous homemade food. Friendly staff. Nothing is too much trouble. Pizza, pasta and wine delicious.

Our family really enjoyed this place. The server was extremely friendly and helpful. We had lasagna, pesto, salmon, pasta, and a pizza. Everything was really tasty! Flavors were appropriate for some family members that are picky eaters. They even modified a pasta dish and left...More

We loved this place. We visited in a chilly January day and were waved in by the owner. My three picky kids loved the food. The pizzas were good sized and the lasagna was delicious and the pricing was reasonable. The owner/host made us feel welcome. This was one of our better family meals while in Paris!

column3: Good place close to the Eiffel Tower
column4: The staff was very welcoming and the pizza was good as well. The Vegetarienne pizza had surprisingly few vegetables though .. Great if you want to eat something relatively cheap close to the Eiffel Tower!
Very good food..average prizes and really nice Staff.. i had the "penne au poulet" which comes with a really tasty..rich and creamy Sauce..would defenately come back..bella italia

We were in the mood for Italian food in Paris and Pizza la Gourmandise was everything we could have wished for. The owner was so warm and friendly and the pizzas and pastas were delicious and reasonably priced. Eating and people-watching in this cozy little cafe tucked in a side street was an evening we won’t forget.

column3: Great location, warm atmosphere, delicious food!
column4: We were visiting Paris for one night, and we were looking for a place to enjoy a casual dinner on the night of US Thanksgiving with our 11 year old daughter. As soon as we walked in, we knew we had made a great choice! The service was extremely warm and friendly, and everyone who came in the door was welcomed equally. We were served by an older gentleman from Spain who spoke to us in both English and Spanish - definitely a unique experience considering we were at an Italian restaurant in France, and we loved it!  We ordered pizzas and wine - my husband especially enjoyed the “Texas” pizza with chorizo, and the caprese salad with avocado was the best my daughter has ever had. There was another family dining with two younger children, and I was so impressed with how kind and engaging our server was with them. It was a great way to end our evening, and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious, affordable meal in a relaxing environment.
We decided to go here because it seemed like the best restaurant which served pasta in the area. Very good food, nice prices and staff that made you feel welcome.

column3: Wonderful Food, Fun and Friendly Service
column4: It seems there are very consistent reviews of La Gourmandise!! Ours was very similar to all the previous ones....the sign of a great place! The owner smiled and waved at us from across the street. At the time, we were not looking for a meal, but later that night we decided to give it a try. It was close to our hotel and we were exhausted.  Immediately, the owner was friendly and engaging (which seems to be in short supply in some Paris restaurants). The wine, salads, pizza and pasta were all delicious for our whole group.  It's a relaxing atmosphere and was the perfect place for us. We all highly recommend it!

I recently found this restaurant while walking around the Eiffel Tower area. Great customer service! They didn’t say anything when my daughter requested a pepperoni pizza with no cheese. She said it tasted great!
Very tasty pizza for decent price in a short walking distance from Eiffel Tower. Locals are also love this place.
2 adults and 1 teen, tastey and specials meals, highlly recommand, fast and home serving with a big smile

Very nice place with good food. The salad was amazing, it was the tuna salad, a little bit greasy, but delicious. The pizza had good quality ingredients. The prices are fair, so I totally recommend!!!
We visited this restaurant for lunch. Service was very good & friendly & the pizzas we had were quite good.

column3: My go to place for pizza in Paris
column4: Always stop here at least once while in Paris. Owner is very friendly and accommodating. Food is great and the service is excellent. I highly recommend this place. Prices are very reasonable too.
Walked by this restaurant and decided to give it a try. The food was good and the servers very accomodating. Would recommend them for an easy going and casual italian dinner.
Great food and friendly staff. Very reasonably priced food and drinks. It's located in a side street but definitely worth the visit.
We enjoyed so much that we ate dinner 2 nights in a row! Very homey atmosphere. Pizza excellent. We also enjoyed penne vegetarien, minestrone soup and vegetable lasagna.
Very good prices. Nice and kind stuff!!! The food was excellent and they served really quick. I would recommended it for the pizza!!
Low prices. The serving was very kind. And the pizza was big and good tasty. Good environment. You should try.
Food was fantastic, really nice. I had arrabiata pasta and my girlfriend had the four cheese pizza - they were both really good with generous helpings. Staff were very friendly too.
Great pizza. Pasta could be better - I mean more typical and italian. But awesome waiter made that dinner really really nice
The place is little but cozy, the owner spoke english, he was very polite and friendly. And very tasty pizza. I felt like in Italy. Thanks!

You gain weight just walking into the store. The selections ate not only delicious looking but the smells when you walk in is the first sign of freshness. I couldn't pick one item so I suggest you try them all.
Nice family restaurant in Paris, very dated interiors, but its all about the food, and we went here twice the kids loved the pizza!

column3: Ok food in the Eiffel tower area
column4: Even tho it looks like an old fast-food restaurant the food was ok and friendly staff. Ordered pizza and carbonara, but the carbonara wasn't really good. The pizza looked really nice, but I didn't quite like the tomatosauce.
The food is good. The interior could be better. For the restrooms, you need to go outside so that’s not very confortamble. The owner is customer-friendly.
If you’re looking for a great pizza in Paris, this is the place! This is as close to Italian pizza and Lasagne in France as we have gotten! Wonderful staff and good prices! We will be back for more!
Great prices, great pizza. In a land of exotica (to Americans) Parisian foods, the Margarita Pizza hit the spot for my picky kiddos.
Not far from batoux mouche river cruise seine harbor, delicious pizza, salad and lasagna. Very friendly staff :)

We came to this place really hungry, and got an amazing pizza! The price was good considering it was in a really touristy area. The server was nice and the pizza came fast after ordering it. The best pizza I've eaten in a while!
Stopped here for lunch and it was delicious. Reasonable prices, great service, they had TV for the WC and Wifi. Beer was cold. I would come back
Very decent food. Rich menu. The pizza is particularly good. Very reasonable prices too. Casual seating. Big TV that came in handy for watching a WC game while having lunch. Very friendly owner.
This a good place to have lunch if you’re near the Eiffel Tower. Staff is courteous and they have an English menu. Prices are reasonable and portions are good. Lunch for 2 cost € 35. Cheers!
Friendly waiters, but pizza was horrible, thin dough, with sauce.. minimum cheese and sausages.. im dissapointed :)
The place is cozy, the waiters are friendly, the salad was excellent, the pizza was good but had extra oil. Price is fair. I recommend it if u r close to Eiffel tower and don't know where to eat.

Good pizza near the Eiffel Tower on a small, fun street. The staff were very nice and accommodating. I had pasta which was okay however the best choice is pizza. Everyone in our group who had pizza loved it.
Great pizza. Very friendly owner. We were looking for pizza & found this amazing little spot. Would recommend to anyone.
Great italian style place, real pizza and very tasty. You can smell the pizza from outside.awesome place

We visited with our 3 kids aged 4-7 and the service was so quick and friendly, we felt very welcomed. The pizza was delicious, they had menus in English and we were also recommended an excellent bottle of wine.

We ate here on half term, friendly little place, good food, good value we had 2 pizzas, steak and a pasta dish and drinks under €70, the pizza could be shared between 2 children as they struggled to finish them

Great Italian food. Small portions but very tasty. Friendly and laid back staff not rushing customers around wanting you to stay and spend :) we ordered 3 pasta dishes and deserts. Great wine too ! Highly recommended.
We enjoyed this restaurant very much. Nice people, great food and good prices (11-15 Euro for Pizza).

What a great stay . Delicious food , great service nice attitude. A good range of different pizza was offered. Prices were for this location pretty good. Margarita just cost 10€ and the size was good. Just 900m from Tour Eiffel Recommended
Pizza was fine. Awful pasta. The seafood from pasta was not fresh. Shrimp was rubbery. Over cooked noodle. No taste sauce.

If you're looking for relatively cheap but good quality pizza then this is your place. We were two but one pizza was more than enough. Very friendly and welcoming people, would definitely recommend. Right by the Eiffel Tower too!

column3: Looking for Italian? This is your place.
column4: Went for dinner and ordered a bottle of wine, a pizza, and some pasta. One pizza was plenty for two people and the pasta was great. Had a very nice atmosphere and was a little off the beaten path. Would definitely go back here again!
We got the wood fired pizza which was authentic and very good. Attentive and kind service. Easy enough to do in English.
It was nice, service is very nice, you have good feeling about this place when you come in. Pizza is tin and jucy, bravo again amigo :))

column3: Best place for a pasta n' pizza
column4: Me and my girlfriend went for a pizza. But we decided to go for a Salmon and Chicken pasta. Great plate and really big for a regular person. Worth the money.
Warm place with very tasty pizza. Italian pizza with catalog on photos. Nothing to hide with prices.

Based on other Trip Advisor reviews, we decided on this restaurant. We were able to be seated right away. There were four of us, but we split three different pizzas. The service was quick and excellent. The pizzas were tasty. A good meal.
We stopped and ordered food to go since it was a long day....pizza was really good, eggplant parm was excellent & so was the lasagna bolognese! Very happy we found this place!

Had a great pizza here. My wife had the lasagna and said it was delicious. The place is simple but it's not expensive and service was very accommodating and friendly. It's a neighborhood place and very tasty.
The owner is such a nice guy! Worth it just for that but the food was pretty great too my husband had a really good duck leg and I had a really savoury pizza
Friendly and attentive staff, great authentic Italian food. Yummy! Close to Eiffel, off a little corner. Must come!
Had a quick lunch! Tomato mozzarela basil salad and a great pizza reggina! Le formule(combo menu) Must do after Eifel tower lunch walk! Excellent prices!!! Coming back soon!
Very nice guys and great food. Amazing experience, very close to Tour Eiffel. Anda nice priece. Give a try

Went there for lunch and there was a menu thing-main with dessert or appetizer with main for 11 euros I had a salmon lasagna and it was pretty good ! the waiter was friendly The drinks were expensive tho. Cola 330ml cost 4euros
Stumbled across at almost 2300, friendly welcome, food hot and fresh, reasonably priced, would return and recommend, pizza and onion soup hot and tasty!
A very nice place to go for a lunch. Reasonable price (considering it's Paris). Service was excellent!
The owner is in charge of the service and is very friendly. Pizza's and couscous are very tasty. Food is always fresh. On top of that: it's cheap.
Absolutely delicious pizza and pasta! Would write more but don't want the food to get cold. This place was perfect.
Small but very lovely place. Prices are responsible and Italian dishes are tasty. Owner of pizzeria is welcoming and very friendly! Like it!

column3: Great place for pizza at a reasonable price.
column4: Owner is always friendly and welcomes you like an old friend. We always try to eat here at least once when we get to Paris. The prices are very reasonable and the food is very tasty.

column3: I absolutely loved this place and food!
column4: We were desperate for a good place to eat after trying too much cafe food. Luckily, we walked into this restaurant and oh my, the pizza was outstanding! The service was also wonderful.

column3: Little gem close to the Eiffel Tower
column4: Lovely meal for 5. Great food, great host, fantastic wine (Valpolicella), all for 125EUR plus tip. What more could you ask for? Tiny place, only seating 20 but felt very welcome and kids happy so I'm happy. Carbonara particularly good.

This great little place is just minutes from our apartment and we've been twice, the second time we were welcomed like long time friends. The food is very tasty and reasonably priced, good wine and a lovely home atmosphere. Couldn't fault it.
Amazing Italian pizza in France. Reasonable price fresh toppings and a very friendly owner. Don't let the small size of this restaurant scare you. It's delicious!
We went there twice and both of the times it was great. The staff is very nice and the food is delicious. Price friendly also. Nice place to eat.
This is a quaint pizzeria with pizza that is amazing! We went back for a second time to try out the pasta and lasagna, which are also both delicious. Kindest staff you'll ever meet.
Strange little place. Good service. Lots of people getting take-out pizza, perhaps that's their diamond in the rough. Salads were good. Pasta vegetarian just so-so. Restroom was a turn-off.
Very small Italian restaurant with little curb appeal. But the smell was worth the risk. Great pizza, super friendly service and reasonably priced. The tirimisu for dessert was also excellent.
